short_description: pots2go ceramic café is a clay & pottery products supplier based in harrogate, united kingdom.
long_description: award-winning pottery painting studio and ceramic café in the heart of harrogate. we have so much to offer at pots2go, from pottery painting to make-a-bears, from children's parties to hen do's, from slime parties to bespoke pottery workshops, all of which can be enjoyed with a variety of hot and cold beverages, and handmade cakes. pots2go can provide four children's parties to choose from: pottery painting, make-a-bear, slime & foam clay, plus catering options. pottery prices start at around £15 for small plates, bowls and mugs, with plenty of smaller and bigger items to choose from, and there is no studio fee to paint. we're here to help you treasure these memories forever.

generated_description: pots2go is an award-winning ceramic café and pottery painting studio located in harrogate, england. the company offers a variety of creative activities, including pottery painting, make-a-bears, slime parties, and bespoke pottery workshops. pots2go caters to both children and adults, providing options for parties such as hen do's, ladies nights, and team building sessions. the venue features over 100 items of pottery to paint and 13 tables across two floors. pots2go has been recognized for its excellence, winning the ceramic café of the year award in 2022.
